info.description: Greenpeace Greenwire allows you connect with other volunteers, activists and groups working on environmental campaigns all across the world!
info.title: Greenwire Public

get.description: Return the upcoming events (e.g. start date >= today). Gets an array of `Event` object. Mandatory query param of **domain** determines the site / country the event belongs to.

parameters.description: the site the groups belongs to, example: netherlands
parameters.name: domain

created.description: The date in YYYY-MM-DD HH:MM:SS format, example: 2015-12-31 23:59:59

description.description: A string containing sanitized HTML code

end_date.description: The date in YYYY-MM-DD HH:MM:SS format, example: 2015-12-31 23:59:59

serial.description: The primary key in Drupal, e.g the entity/node id

uuid.description: Universally unique identifier in canonical format, example: de305d54-75b4-431b-adb2-eb6b9e546014

modified.description: The date in YYYY-MM-DD HH:MM:SS format, example: 2015-12-31 23:59:59

serial.description: The primary key in Drupal, e.g the entity/node id

uuid.description: Universally unique identifier in canonical format, example: de305d54-75b4-431b-adb2-eb6b9e546014

serial.description: The primary key in Drupal, e.g the entity/node id

start_date.description: The date in YYYY-MM-DD HH:MM:SS format, example: 2015-12-31 23:59:59

uuid.description: Universally unique identifier in canonical format, example: de305d54-75b4-431b-adb2-eb6b9e546014

limit.description: the nubmer of items per page

resources.description: The name of the requested object/model/resource. Plural if a collection.

get.description: Gets an array of `Volunteer` object. Mandatory query param of **domain** determines the site / country the volunteers are from.

parameters.description: the site the users are registered on, example: netherlands
parameters.name: domain

parameters.description: the number of desired records. Default is 5.
parameters.name: limit

parameters.description: 1 or 0. filter on people that have the default avatar or not.
parameters.name: must_have_default_avatar

uuid.description: Universally unique identifier in canonical format, example: de305d54-75b4-431b-adb2-eb6b9e546014

limit.description: the nubmer of items per page

resources.description: The name of the requested object/model/resource. Plural if a collection.

get.description: Get one specific `Volunteer` object by specifying its UUID in the url path.

uuid.description: Universally unique identifier in canonical format, example: de305d54-75b4-431b-adb2-eb6b9e546014

limit.description: the nubmer of items per page

resources.description: The name of the requested object/model/resource. Plural if a collection.
The name of the requested object/model/resource. Plural if a collection.
